shortDesc: We will provide oxygen cylinder at your home whenever needed.
description: We have Oxygen Cylinders that you can rent. Home delivery is available inside Chittagong city. You can return the cylinder and get a new one when it's expired.

shortDesc: We will go to your home to conduct COVID test.
description: Our expert team will go to your home and collect sample. Results will be made available within the shortest time possible.

shortDesc: Order online and recieve home delivery inside Chittagong, anywhere.
description: We have a large collection of drugs and other pharmaceuticals, which you can order online to get a free home delivery anywhere inside Chittagong.

shortDesc: ICU or non ICU ambulances available all throughout Chittagong
description: You can book an ambulance online if needed. We have both the usual and the ICU ambulances available. Our team will provide transportation from your home to hospitals.

shortDesc: We will go to your home to conduct various tests
description: Various blood tests like CBC, Serum Creatinine , Serum Bilirubin are available. Our team will collect samples from your home and deliver results online. Portable CXR Machines are also available.

shortDesc: Our team is alwaye there for all your COVID related queries
description: Any COVID related queries that you have, you can call our 24/7 helpline at 16266. Our support team will try their best to assist you.
